reviewText: It is worth purchasing just to watch extremely beautiful Kehli O'Byrne being naked.

The film features some really gorgeous, moody cinematography. It is a guilty pleasure. The story is intriguing, diabolical and multi-faceted. The different characters are interesting. I love this film.

I think you should know that although the slip-case of this video tells us that it runs for approximately 90 minutes,my copy,including credits,ran for only 72 minutes.
Looking again at the case I see that the film is 'Edited'.That's an understatement,and in 2002 I don't expect soft-core erotica to be cut at all.

5 stars in the soft  genre, though it's not in the slightest.  It's erotic AND romantic AND tasteful.  Lots of female nudity and a good story line.  The actors are all  attractive, and reasonably adept, and only one character is a sleaze bag, which is relevant to the  thread.  It's a chick flick with skin, even has a happy ending.  Camera and  sound are first rate; good sound track.  Rented it,  watched it; rerented,  rewatched it; ordered it here.
